article_title: RCBH sued by former employee alleging sexual, workplace harassment
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. If you need help, please contact our office at 928-783-3333. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

og.description: SOMERTON – The Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is suing the Regional Center for Border Health, alleging the Somerton-based health care organization wrongly fired an employee in retaliation for making a sexual harassment complaint against a supervisor.
